com.communote.server.web.api.to.listitem

Class DiscussionListItem

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.communote.server.web.api.to.listitem.DiscussionListItem
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class DiscussionListItem
extends Object
implements Serializable
    List item to be attached to a note to provide the details about the discussion the note belongs to.
    Author:
    Communote GmbH - http://www.communote.com/
    See Also:
